column2: Use sharpening stone when you strike a foe below the health threshold. Gain Fury and lose a condition when you use a survival skill. Reduce recharge on survival skills.
Attacks against burning foes have an increased chance to critically hit. Your ferocity is increased.

Convert damaging conditions to boons whenever you gain Distortion or become disabled.
Disables include stun, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, launch, taunt, and fear.
A recipe to make an ascended medium breather with Settler (+Toughness, +Healing Power, and +Condition Damage) stats.

Obtain an Ice Elemental Core from the remains of Shaman Lornarr Dragonseeker in the Snowblind fractal. Take it to a pollenated spore beneath one of the towers in the Silverwastes and imbue it.
This item only has value as part of a collection.
Your critical strikes have a chance to inflict a condition based on your attunement.
A recipe to make an ascended medium breather with Berserker (+Power, +Ferocity, and +Precision) stats.

Double-click to gain a hero point.
The kodans' favorite food. They're both strong and wise, so maybe they're onto something.
Critical hits grant bonus adrenaline and gain a stacking condition damage effect.
Increase the throw velocity and blast radius of grenades. Using a healing skill casts Lesser Grenade Barrage.
Healing Increase to Others per 100 Vitality
<c=@abilitytype>Legendary Assassin.</c> Summon enchanted daggers that will attack as you attack, siphoning life from targets hit.
A recipe to make an ascended light breather with Nomad's (+Toughness, +Healing, and +Vitality) stats.
Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.
A recipe to make an ascended light breather with Rabid (+Condition Damage, +Precision, and +Toughness) stats.

Purchased from the Aetherblade Quartermaster in the Captain Mai Trin Boss fractal for Balls of Dark Energy. Dark Energy can be gained from salvaging ascended items using an Ascended Salvage Kit.
This item only has value as part of a collection.
Might grants you more power and less condition damage. Gain might when using a legendary stance skill.
Critical hits have a chance to cause bleeding. Increases bleed duration.
Activate this Tactic to temporarily summon a fleet of airships that will protect the castle from invaders.
The Mordrem have begun invading Diessa Plateau!
A recipe to make an ascended heavy breather with Cavalier (+Toughness, +Power, and +Ferocity) stats.
Used to craft the backpack Finite Result. Extras can be purchased from the Aetherblade Quartermaster in the Captain Mai Trin Boss fractal for Balls of Dark Energy.
Cleave foes around you with your staff, creating healing orbs for you and your allies.
Unlocks the collection Ad Infinitum II: Upper Bound.
Find a way into Rata Novus.
Gain expertise. Gain condition damage while wielding a sword. Sword skills gain reduced recharge.
Focus weapon skills reflect projectiles. Reduces recharge on focus weapon skills.
Pistol shots pierce and have increased range. Pistol skills have reduced recharge.
The Mordrem have begun invading Kessex Hills!
<c=@abilitytype>Spirit Weapons</c> gain additional casts, improved count recharge, and burn foes they strike.
Gain might when your justice passive effect triggers; gain more might while wielding a scepter.
Increases damage to weakened foes. Striking a foe below the health threshold inflicts weakness.
Purchased with Pristine Fractal Relics from BUY-2046 PFR in Mistlock Observatory.
Harathi Hinterlands: Ruins of Holy Demetra
Outgoing boon and condition duration increase for every boon on you.
Rifles and harpoon guns have increased range, reduced charge, and a chance to blind on critical hits.
Gain power while in fire attunement.
